concept.title: Circular Buffers Overview
concept.shortdesc: This document is an overview of circular buffers.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: Provides a fixed length first-in first-out queue of fixed-size objects.

section.title: Description
section.p: Note the following properties of circular buffers:

li.p: only simple add, remove, and reset operations are available
elements are added to the head of the queue and removed from the tail of the queue
all elements in a circular buffer must be objects of the same type

section.p: Circular buffers are provided by CCirBuf .
A predefined circular buffer of unsigned integers is provided by CCirBuffer.
